desc: Magic Activity products offer both digital and physical hands-on experiences for early childhood development. Magic Activity gives traditional books, flash cards and jigsaw puzzle a brand-new value by making them interactive and immersive using Augmented Reality and Machine Learning technologies.

layout.text: Educational & Hands-on Play for Kids with Magic Activity AR Toys
Enhancing kids’ learning by integrating fun through augmented reality. Magic Activity™ envisions creating augmented reality products that provide immersive experiences for all ages.
